Text: checking inGreg I can not even imagine all the tension and activity that have kept you busy these past weeks Maybe you can give me a call when the dust settles a little Sunday PM might be good I will be at home There is nothing critical just thought you might want to vent Liz has been a champ and if anything went critical I would let her know Cash margins are getting thin with all the rate cuts but you are liquid and getting the best available Ben Notice Regarding Entry of Orders and Instructions Please do not transmit orders andor instructions regarding your UBSPaineWebber accounts by email Orders andor instructions transmitted by email will not be accepted by UBSPaineWebber and UBSPaineWebber will not be responsible for carrying out such orders andor instructions Notice Regarding Privacy and Confidentiality UBSPaineWebber reserves the right to monitor and review the content of all email communications sent andor received by its employees

tax loss sellingGreg with the end of the year approaching we may want to look at some tax loss selling Nov is a key date to avoid wash sale rules Lets talk about the possibilities Ben PS Happy Thanksgiving
